attributes.action: Adopt the following definition of Anglophobia:
attributes.additional_details: Parliament has already voted on a definition of Islamophobia, but never sought to affirm the rights of the indigenous population.  At the same time, English culture and tradition are being challenged for ideological and political reasons.  Parliament needs to reaffirm that it's actually OK to be English, and to combat this assault on our ethnicity
attributes.background: ANGLOPHOBIA IS ROOTED IN RACISM AND IS A TYPE OF RACISM THAT TARGETS EXPRESSIONS OF ENGLISHNESS OR PERCEIVED ENGLISHNESS

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

It's already illegal to discriminate against somebody on the grounds of race and nationality under the Equality Act 2010. Find out more:
https://www.equalityhumanrights.com/en/advice-and-guidance/race-discrimination
